A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is another great addition to the Star Wars Saga\,but it is something different that most fans will be confused with and fall in love eventually.The CGI are amazing as all ways but the thing that threw me off is that they were afraid to kill off some characters to make space for the new ones.In general The Last Jedi will entertain you and it will do it in a differenent\,fun and suprising way. \nFINAL VERDICT: 8.5/10
